Key Match Events: Vangelis Pavlidis scored the winning goal in the fourth minute of stoppage time
Jude Bellingham scored an equalizing goal for England in the 87th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Lee Carsley got a sobering reality check after the defeat
John Stones expressed disappointment with the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in memory of George Baldock, a former Greek international who passed away this week
Others: England started the match with an ultra-attacking line-up but misfired badly
Greece had three goals ruled out against England
